On Sun, May 1, 2022 at 6:43 PM viccon ***@***.***> wrote:

> @FreshKhalifa347 <https://github.com/FreshKhalifa347>
> This is not my account, I'm just using debug_traceCall api, so I think
> there should be a fix to handle this problem, which could cause troubles to
> developers (eg. mempool monitoring)

@viccon tested it on `25c9b49f` and master, got results almost instantly. 
What do you see in the geth logs while this is happening?
